name: Astro Pinball
description:
Lucky you! You've chosen one of the most true-to-Iife, arcade quality games in the world, with over 30 game variations.

Just like the real thing:
All the sights, sounds, fun and excitement of real arcade pinball, right in your own home. The built-in computer calculates the precise angle of bounce and gives you extra-fast response with your flippers, so thereâ€™s nothing to hold up the action.
